title: An unusual amount of lag has been plaguing me.
body: Its actually unusual for me to have lag at all. This game has always run super well for me, so I was wondering if anyone else has been running into a bunch of lag and connection issues that don't usually happen for them.

replies.body: There's a number of different things that could be going on here such as packet loss from a bad ISP route, or we might just need to adjust a couple network settings to make sure you can get a solid link with our servers. Let's start with checking out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but hit me back if that doesn't do the trick.
